---
title: Selective Functional Movement Assessment (SFMA)
subtitle: General musculoskeletal movement screen
---


# Purpose

observe movement restrictions in individuals with known musculoskeletal disorders



# Techniques

## Deep Squat

Although this is labeled the "Deep squat" in SFMA, this would be colloquially considered an [overhead squat]({{< var ref-overhead-squat.path >}})

::: {.columns}
::: {.column}
Instructions

- Feet pointed forward
- Feet shulder width apart
- Hold dowel overhead

:::
::: {.column}

Bilateral, symmetrical, functional mobility of:

- Hips
- Knees
- Ankles

:::
:::

::: {.columns}
::: {.column}

:::
